00503                 static bool mShuttingDown;
00504 
00516                 static void threadUpdate()
00517                 {
00518                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00519                         {
00520                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().processQueuedSounds();
00521                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().updateBuffers();
00522                                 mUpdateThread->yield();
00523                         }
00524                 }
00525 
00526 #endif
